{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Comtrend |model=PG-9172 |revision=AC |asin= |series= |fcc_date=08/29/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=L9VPG9172AC |pcb_id= |pwr_v=110-240 |pwr_amp=0.2 |pwr_conn=AC, corded |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Celeno |cpu1_model=CL1860;Celeno, MediaTek, CL1860, 1630-BMTH, FTPA6M36H; |cpu2_brand=Marvell |cpu2_model=88LX3142;M, 88LX3142-TFJ2, KRRHJ.1JW, 1614 A0E, TW; |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWQE-25H |ram2=64 |ram2_brand=EtronTech |ram2_model=EM68B16CWQH-25H |wi1_chip1_brand=Celeno |wi1_chip1_model=CL1860;Celeno, MediaTek, CL1860, 1630-BMTH, FTPA6M36H; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Celeno |wi2_chip1_model=CL2200;Celeno, MediaTek, CL2200, 1635-BMAL, ETPAFX26; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A;AR8035-A, NJ630004, 1630 CN; |eth_chip3_brand=Marvell |eth_chip3_model=88E1510 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1GbE Transceiver;Atheros;AR8035-A;AR8035-A, NJ630004, 1630 CN;1; ,,, 1GbE Transceiver;Marvell;88E1510;M, 88E1510-NNB2, N02P470.14JW, 1630 A0S, SG;1; ,,, 1Gbps G.hn Baseband AFE;Marvell;88LX2718;M, 88LX2718-NAX2, G0SF741.4JW, 1615 A1E, TW;1; |flags=PowerLine, G.hn, MIMO, TR-069, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ComtrendXXXX_2.4GHz, ComtrendXXXX_5GHz |oui=F8:8E:85 |oui_eth=F8:8E:85 }} {{TagLine|G.hn WiFi AC Powerline Ethernet Adapter}} :{{ProductPage|http://us.comtrend.com/products/pg-9172ac/}} "50XX14-473" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. There appears to be an internal GbE connection between the two CPUs
handled by the [[Marvell]] 88E1510 and a second [[Atheros]] AR8035-A chip. [http://investor.marvell.com/phoenix.zhtml?c=120802&p=irol-newsArticle_print&ID=1888574 ''News Release: G.hn Silicon to Power Connectivity'' on '''Marvell'''] *[[Marvell]] 88LX3142, MAC/BBP G.hn; *[[Marvell]] 88LX2718/88LX2720, AFE G.hn; *[[Marvell]] 88E1510/88E1512, Gigabit PHY; ===See also=== *[[Comtrend PG-9172AC]] - ''G.hn WiFi AC Powerline Adapter'' • [http://us.comtrend.com/products/pg-9172ac/ PPage] *[[Comtrend PG-9172PoE]] - ''G.hn PoE Powerline Adapter'' • [http://us.comtrend.com/products/pg-9172poe/ PPage] *[[Comtrend PG-9172PT]] - ''1200Mbps G.hn Powerline Adapter'' • [http://us.comtrend.com/products/pg-9172pt/ PPage] *[[Comtrend PG-9172]] - ''1200 Mbps G.hn Powerline Adapter'' • [http://us.comtrend.com/products/pg-9172/ PPage] :SoC: [[Marvell]] 88LX3142 (G.hn Digital Baseband) :AFE: [[Marvell]] 88LX2718 (Analog Front End chip) :LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E1510 (Gigabit Ethernet PHY) :RAM: 8MB, Flash: 8MB, OUI: F8:8E:85, :PSU: 100-240VAC ~50/60Hz 0.2A • [http://www.anandtech.com/show/10293/comtrend-pg9172-powerline-adapter-review-ghn-gets-primed-for-retail-push AT] • [https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/lanwan/lanwan-reviews/32763-comtrend-pg-9172-g-hn-powerline-adapter-reviewed SNB] *[[Comtrend PG-9171n]] - ''G.hn WiFi N Powerline Adapter'' • [http://us.comtrend.com/products/pg-9171n/ PPage] *[[Comtrend PG-9072]] - ''AC1200 G.hn Powerline Adapter'' • [http://us.comtrend.com/products/pg-9072/ PPage] :SoC: [[Marvell]] 88LX3142 (Baseband), AFE: [[Marvell]] 88LX2718 :WiSoC: [[Celeno]] CL1860 @580MHz [[MIPS 24KEc]] WiSoC • [http://www.celeno.com/media-room/press-releases/437-comtrend-chooses-celeno-for-smart-powerline-wi-fi-extenders.html PR] :WLAN 2.4GHz: 2T2R 802.11n (rebranded [[MediaTek MT7620A]]) :WLAN 5GHz: [[Celeno]] CL2200 (rebranded [[MediaTek]] MT7612EN) :5GHz Amplifier: 2x [[Skyworks]] SKY85717-21 (2T2R 802.11an/ac) :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM68C16CWQE-25H (128MB DDR2-800) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12835FM2I-10G (16MB) :LAN: [[Atheros]] AR8035-A (1x Gigabit port) :+ [[Marvell]] 88E1510 (Gigabit Ethernet PHY) :Antenna: 2x Dual-Band antenna (''Airgain N2425D'') *[[Comtrend PG-9073]] - ''1GbE G.hn Powerline Adapter'' • [http://us.comtrend.com/products/pg-9073/ PPage] :SoC: [[Marvell]] 88LX3142 (Baseband), AFE: [[Marvell]] 88LX2718 :RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM68B16CWQH-25H (64MB DDR2-800) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L3206EM2I-12G (4MB) • [http://www.celeno.com/media-room/press-releases/437-comtrend-chooses-celeno-for-smart-powerline-wi-fi-extenders.html PR] :LAN: [[Marvell]] 88E1510 (Alaska 1x Gigabit port) __NOTOC__
